text: Jean-Marie Sermier Jean-Marie Sermier (born March 5, 1961 in Nozeroy, Jura) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Jura department, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jura (department) Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Marie Sermier
